name: Victory Blade - Raven & Mystic
description:
A brand new Victory Blade game. Play as Raven and Mystic as the look for a certain someone. Enjoy this short Victory Blade Game. 

★ New Characters

★ New Rivals

★ New Bosses

★ Short and Sweet

Note - This Game does not have to be played to understand the next main game (also

known as spinoff. but this is a spin off that links into the story)

Credits in Game. 

★ Victory Blade and Victory Blade II The First Act should be played if you

want to understand this game.  (both are free)
